meanings.definition: A synthetic compound used as a local anesthetic.
meanings.sent1: The dentist injected novocaines to numb my tooth before filling a cavity.
meanings.sent2: Novocaines are commonly used by doctors to reduce pain during medical procedures.
meanings.sent3: The novocaines worked like magic, making my mouth feel like a sleepy cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her fear of needles vanished as the novocaines whispered a painless promise.
meanings.sent5: The novocaines danced through my nerves, silencing any discomfort.

meanings.sent1: I asked the pharmacist for two novocaines to ease my toothache.
meanings.sent2: The novocaines in the cabinet were running low, so I needed to restock.
meanings.sent3: The novocaines on the shelf seemed to be having a party, celebrating their pain-relieving powers.
meanings.sent4: In her hand, the novocaines transformed into tiny warriors, ready to battle any ache.
meanings.sent5: The novocaines in the bottle sparkled like tiny gems of relief.
